item.title: Writing Stages
item.description: Overview Martian supports writing pipeline stages in virtually any language. The only requirement is that the language support JSON, which is nearly universal. A Martian stage is an executable, either interpreted or compiled, that takes four command-line arguments as follows: $ stage_executable <type> <metadata_path> <files_path> <journal_prefix> The type argument is one of split, join, or main (the main body of the stage). The stage executable should switch on that type and provide implementations for each.
